value.title: Can Clem DESTROY Serral?! (StarCraft 2)
value.excerpt: Ever since winning ESL Winter last month, Clem has been on a new all-time high. He's destroying all competition left right and center and is looking better than ever before. In this best-of-2 series of top level StarCraft 2 Clem takes on Serral, the highest ranked player in the world. Support my work:

value.excerpt: My first try at Heart of the Swarm Nightmare Difficulty StarCraft 2 Campaign created by Rhyme!
